00052 
00053 bp_api_struct * uvm_ml_bp_bootstrap( char **uvmTops,
00054                               char **uvmTests,
00055                              bp_serror_t   *   serror) {
00056     vector<string> tops;
00057 
00058     if (getenv("UNILANG_DEBUG_MODE"))
00059         BpInterconnect::SetTraceMode(1);
00060 
00061     if (uvmTops) 
00062     {
00063         char * top;
00064         for (int j = 0; (top = uvmTops[j]) && *(top); j++)
00065             tops.push_back(string(top));
00066     }
00067 
00068     vector<string> tests;
00069     if (uvmTests) 
00070     {
00071         char * test;
00072         for (int j = 0; (test = uvmTests[j]) && *(test); j++)
00073             tests.push_back(string(test));
00074     }
00075 
00076     return Bp::BpInterconnect::Bootstrap(tops,tests, serror);
00077 }
00078 
00079 
00080 int uvm_ml_bp_elaborate(void *cbInfo){ 
00081     return BpInterconnect::Elaborate(cbInfo);
00082 }

00146 static int bp_register_framework(char *                 framework_name,
00147                           char *                 framework_indicators[],
00148                           bp_frmw_c_api_struct * framework_api)
00149 {
00150     string frmwName = framework_name;
00151     vector<string> frmwIndicators;
00152 
00153     for (int j = 0; framework_indicators[j] != 0 && framework_indicators[j][0] != '\0'; j++)
00154       frmwIndicators.push_back(string(framework_indicators[j]));
00155 
00156     int res = BpInterconnect::RegisterFramework(frmwName, frmwIndicators, framework_api);
00157     if (getenv("UVM_ML_DEBUG_MODE"))
00158         BpInterconnect::SetTraceMode(1);
00159 
00160     return res;
00161 }
00162

00165 
00169 static char * bp_get_version() 
00170 {
00171   char * result = const_cast<char *> (BpInterconnect::GetVersion().c_str());
00172   BpInterconnect::DebugTrace("In bp_get_version(). Returned version is %s\n", result);
00173   return result;
00174 }

00195 static int bp_add_root_node (unsigned     adapter_id, 
00196                       unsigned     top_level_id, 
00197                       const char * component_name,
00198                       const char * instance_name) 
00199 { 
00200     string componentName = component_name;
00201     string instanceName  = instance_name;
00202     return BpInterconnect::AddRootNode(adapter_id, top_level_id, componentName, instanceName);
00203 }

00205 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00207 
00215 static int bp_run_test(int framework_id, int tops_n, char ** tops, char * test)
00216 {
00217 
00218     BpInterconnect::DebugTrace("In bp_run_test() called by framework %d\n", framework_id);
00219 
00220     Bp::BpInterconnect::PreRunCleanup(); // Allow multiple tests activated back-to-back
00221 
00222     vector<string> topStr;
00223 
00224     for (int j = 0; j < tops_n; j++)
00225       if (tops[j][0] != '\0')
00226           topStr.push_back(string (tops[j]));
00227 
00228     vector<string> testStr; // BpInterconnect::ProcessTopsAndTests() accepts a vector and issues an error if has more than 1 element
00229     
00230     if (test != NULL && test[0] != '\0')
00231         testStr.push_back(string (test));
00232 
00233     try {
00234         Bp::BpInterconnect::ProcessTopsAndTests(topStr, testStr);
00235     }
00236     catch (int ) 
00237     {
00238         // TBD: Add a message arguments parsing failed
00239         return 0;
00240     }
00241     return Bp::BpInterconnect::Elaborate(NULL);   
00242 }

00263     return Bp::BpInterconnect::GetTraceMode();
00264 }

00307 static unsigned bp_connect(unsigned       framework_id, 
00308                     const char *   path1,
00309                     const char *   path2)
00310 {
00311     BpInterconnect::DebugTrace("In bp_connect() called by framework %d for producer_path = %s provider_path = %s\n", framework_id, path1, path2);
00312     unsigned result = BpInterconnect::RegisterRoute(framework_id, path1, path2);
00313     BpInterconnect::DebugTrace("In bp_connect() result = %d\n", result);
00314     return result;
00315 }
00316 
00317 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00318 //* Returns the size of a connector.
00324 static int bp_get_connector_size(int framework_id, int connector_id) 
00325 {
00326   int result = BpInterconnect::GetConnectorSize(framework_id,connector_id); 
00327   BpInterconnect::DebugTrace("In bp_get_connector_size() for framework %d with connector_id %d. Result is: %d\n",
00328                   framework_id,connector_id,result);
00329   return result;
00330 }

00347                             int              callback_framework_id,

00350                             double           time_value)

00421 static int bp_put(int                framework_id,
00422            int                producer_id,
00423            unsigned int       stream_size,
00424            uvm_ml_stream_t    stream,
00425            uvm_ml_time_unit * time_unit,

00429     assert (false);
00430     return 0;

00433 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00435 
00457 static int bp_request_put(int                framework_id,
00458                    int                producer_id,
00459                    int                call_id, 
00460                    unsigned int       stream_size, 
00461                    uvm_ml_stream_t    stream,
00462                    unsigned int     * done,
00463                    uvm_ml_time_unit * time_unit,
00464                    double           * time_value) 
00465 {
00466     // Time_unit and time_value are passed by pointer in anticipation that some implementations may support true blocking mode
00467     BpInterconnect::DebugTrace("In bp_request_put()\n");
00468     bool done_tmp = false;
00469     int result = BpInterconnect::RequestPut(framework_id, producer_id, call_id, stream_size, stream, done_tmp, *time_unit, *time_value);
00470     *done = done_tmp; 
00471     return result;
00472 }

00947                         int                initiator_id, 
00948                         unsigned int     * stream_size,
00949                         uvm_ml_stream_t  * stream,
00950                         uvm_ml_time_unit * delay_unit,

00962 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00964 
00985 static int bp_request_b_transport_tlm2(int               framework_id, 
00986                                 int               initiator_id, 
00987                                 int               call_id,
00988                                 unsigned int *    stream_size,
00989                                 uvm_ml_stream_t * stream,
00990                                 uvm_ml_time_unit  delay_unit,
00991                                 double            delay_value,
00992                                 unsigned int *    done, 
00993                                 uvm_ml_time_unit  time_unit, 
00994                                 double            time_value)
00995 {
00996   BpInterconnect::DebugTrace("In bp_request_b_transport_tlm2()\n");
00997 
00998   uvm_ml_time delay;
00999   delay.units = delay_unit;
01000   delay.value = delay_value;
01001 
01002   bool done_tmp = false;
01003   int result = BpInterconnect::RequestBTransportTLM2(framework_id,initiator_id,call_id,*stream_size,*stream,delay,done_tmp,time_unit,time_value);
01004   *done = done_tmp;
01005   return result;
01006 }

01035 
01049 static uvm_ml_tlm_sync_enum bp_nb_transport_fw(int                framework_id, 
01050                                         int                initiator_id,
01051                                         unsigned int *     stream_size,
01052                                         uvm_ml_stream_t *  stream,
01053                                         uvm_ml_tlm_phase * phase,
01054                                         unsigned int       transaction_id,
01055                                         uvm_ml_time_unit * delay_unit,
01056                                         double *           delay_value, 
01057                                         uvm_ml_time_unit   time_unit, 
01058                                         double             time_value)
01059 {
01060   BpInterconnect::DebugTrace("In bp_nb_transport_fw()\n");
01061 
01062   uvm_ml_time delay;
01063   delay.units = *delay_unit;
01064   delay.value = *delay_value;
01065 
01066   uvm_ml_tlm_sync_enum result = BpInterconnect::NbTransportFwTLM2(framework_id,initiator_id,*stream_size,*stream,*phase,transaction_id,delay,time_unit,time_value);
01067 
01068   *delay_unit = delay.units;
01069   *delay_value = delay.value;
01070 
01071   return result;
01072 }

01090 static uvm_ml_tlm_sync_enum bp_nb_transport_bw(int                framework_id, 
01091                                         int                target_id,
01092                                         unsigned int *     stream_size,
01093                                         uvm_ml_stream_t *  stream,
01094                                         uvm_ml_tlm_phase * phase,
01095                                         unsigned int       transaction_id,
01096                                         uvm_ml_time_unit * delay_unit,
01097                                         double *           delay_value, 
01098                                         uvm_ml_time_unit   time_unit, 
01099                                         double             time_value)
01100 {
01101   BpInterconnect::DebugTrace("In bp_nb_transport_bw()\n");
01102 
01103   uvm_ml_time delay;
01104   delay.units = *delay_unit;
01105   delay.value = *delay_value;
01106 
01107   uvm_ml_tlm_sync_enum result = BpInterconnect::NbTransportBwTLM2(framework_id,target_id,*stream_size,*stream,*phase,transaction_id,delay,time_unit,time_value);
01108 
01109   *delay_unit = delay.units;
01110   *delay_value = delay.value;
01111 
01112   return result;
01113 }

01159 static void bp_turn_off_transaction_mapping(int framework_id, const char *socket_name)
01160 {
01161   BpInterconnect::DebugTrace("In bp_turn_off_transaction_mapping() called by framework %d.\n", framework_id);
01162 
01163   string socketName = socket_name;
01164   BpInterconnect::TurnOffTransactionMapping(framework_id, socketName);
01165 }

01201 //******************************************************************************
01202 // ----- Type identification and mapping API
01203 //******************************************************************************
01204 
01205 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01207 
01220 static uvm_ml_type_id_t bp_get_type_id_from_name(int framework_id, const char* type_name) 
01221 { 
01222     uvm_ml_type_id_t result = BpInterconnect::GetTypeIdByTypeName(framework_id,string(type_name));
01223     BpInterconnect::DebugTrace("In bp_get_type_id_from_name() called by framework %d for type name %s. Returned id is %d\n", framework_id, type_name, (int) result);
01224     return result;
01225 }
01226 
01227 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01229 
01238 static char* bp_get_type_name_from_id(int framework_id, uvm_ml_type_id_t type_id) 
01239 { 
01240     char * result = const_cast<char *> (BpInterconnect::GetTypeNameByTypeId(framework_id,type_id,true).c_str());
01241     BpInterconnect::DebugTrace("In bp_get_type_name_from_id() called by framework %d for type id %d. Returned type name is %s\n", framework_id, type_id, result);
01242     return result;
01243 }
01244 
01245 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01247 
01257 static int bp_set_match_types(int framework_id, const char* type1, const char* type2) {
01258     BpInterconnect::DebugTrace("In bp_set_match_types() called by framework %d with type1 = %s type2 = %s\n",framework_id,type1,type2);
01259     
01260     string frameworkIndicator1, frameworkIndicator2, typeName1, typeName2;
01261 
01262     BpInterconnect::ParseTypeName(string(type1), frameworkIndicator1, typeName1);
01263     BpInterconnect::ParseTypeName(string(type2), frameworkIndicator2, typeName2);
01264     BpLangTypeName bpType1 (frameworkIndicator1, typeName1);
01265     BpLangTypeName bpType2 (frameworkIndicator2, typeName2);
01266 
01267     bool res = BpInterconnect::RegisterTypeMatch(bpType1, bpType2); 
01268     // false can be returned in a potentiaally legal scenario if the frameworks is not currently used
01269     return (res == true ? 1 : 0);
01270 }

01509     const char *                  item_scope,
01510     const char *                  item_name,
01511     const char *                  accessor_name,
01512     unsigned int                  stream_size,
01513     uvm_ml_stream_t               stream,
01514     uvm_ml_time_unit              time_unit, 
01515     double                        time_value)
01516 {

01518     BpInterconnect::DebugTrace("            item_scope = %s item_name = %s\n", item_scope, item_name);
01519     BpInterconnect::DebugTrace("            action = %d stream_size = %d\n", action, stream_size);
01520     BpInterconnect::DebugTrace("            stream kind = %d accessor_name = %s\n", *(int *)stream, accessor_name);
01521     BpInterconnect::DebugTrace("\n");
01522 
01523     return 1;
01524 }

01700 #define SET_TRAY_ITEM(i) m_c_api_tray.i##_ptr = bp_##i
01701 
01702 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01704 //
01705 void BpInterconnect::fillCApiTray() 
01706 {
01707   SET_TRAY_ITEM(set_trace_mode);
01708   SET_TRAY_ITEM(register_framework); 
01709   SET_TRAY_ITEM(get_version);
01710   SET_TRAY_ITEM(add_root_node);
01711   SET_TRAY_ITEM(run_test);
01712   SET_TRAY_ITEM(connect);
01713   SET_TRAY_ITEM(get_connector_size);
01714 
01715   SET_TRAY_ITEM(put);
01716   SET_TRAY_ITEM(nb_put);
01717   SET_TRAY_ITEM(can_put);
01718   SET_TRAY_ITEM(notify_end_blocking);
01719   SET_TRAY_ITEM(get);
01720   SET_TRAY_ITEM(nb_get);
01721   SET_TRAY_ITEM(can_get);
01722   SET_TRAY_ITEM(transport);
01723   SET_TRAY_ITEM(nb_transport);
01724   SET_TRAY_ITEM(write);
01725   SET_TRAY_ITEM(request_put);
01726   SET_TRAY_ITEM(request_get);
01727   SET_TRAY_ITEM(get_requested);
01728   SET_TRAY_ITEM(peek);
01729   SET_TRAY_ITEM(request_peek);
01730   SET_TRAY_ITEM(peek_requested);
01731   SET_TRAY_ITEM(nb_peek);
01732   SET_TRAY_ITEM(can_peek);
01733   SET_TRAY_ITEM(request_transport);
01734   SET_TRAY_ITEM(transport_response);
01735   
01736   SET_TRAY_ITEM(b_transport_tlm2);
01737   SET_TRAY_ITEM(request_b_transport_tlm2);
01738   SET_TRAY_ITEM(b_transport_tlm2_response);
01739   SET_TRAY_ITEM(nb_transport_fw);
01740   SET_TRAY_ITEM(nb_transport_bw);
01741   SET_TRAY_ITEM(transport_dbg);
01742   SET_TRAY_ITEM(assign_transaction_id);
01743   SET_TRAY_ITEM(turn_off_transaction_mapping);
01744   SET_TRAY_ITEM(synchronize);
01745   
01746   SET_TRAY_ITEM(get_type_id_from_name);
01747   SET_TRAY_ITEM(get_type_name_from_id);
01748   SET_TRAY_ITEM(set_match_types);
01749 
01750   SET_TRAY_ITEM(create_child_junction_node);
01751     
01752   SET_TRAY_ITEM(reset);  
01753 
01754   SET_TRAY_ITEM(notify_phase);  
01755   SET_TRAY_ITEM(transmit_phase);  
01756   SET_TRAY_ITEM(notify_runtime_phase);  
01757   SET_TRAY_ITEM(notify_phase_done);
01758   SET_TRAY_ITEM(register_srv_providers);
01759 
01760   SET_TRAY_ITEM(get_pack_max_size);
01761   SET_TRAY_ITEM(set_pack_max_size);
01762 
01763   SET_TRAY_ITEM(notify_resource);
01764   SET_TRAY_ITEM(notify_config);
01765 
01766 
01767   SET_TRAY_ITEM(register_time_cb);
01768   SET_TRAY_ITEM(remove_time_cb);
01769   SET_TRAY_ITEM(notify_time_cb);
01770 
01771   SET_TRAY_ITEM(print_request);
01772 
01773 
01774   SET_TRAY_ITEM(notify_event);
01775   SET_TRAY_ITEM(notify_barrier);
01776   SET_TRAY_ITEM(execute_command);
01777 }
01778 
01779 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01781 
01784 bp_api_struct * BpInterconnect::GetProvidedTray()
01785 {
01786     static bool ready = false;
01787     if (!ready) {
01788       fillCApiTray();
01789       ready = true;    
01790     }
01791     return &m_c_api_tray;
01792 }
